getting port 22 connection refused error: i have openssh-server on host and client on client but connection refused
can anyone help with ssh problem?
its either firewalled or doesn't run at all on default port
thats why you should use "ssh -o CheckHostIP no user@host"   else it will complain with every ip-change
command-line line 0: Missing yes/no argument. error
sounds as it doesn't. you had been connected once, all other attempts failed. check /var/log/messages or syslog on server for any sshd-related errors
